description: We've rounded up three of our favorite models for this shoot. Skylar and Brad are the quiet ones. Paul is the motor-mouth, going on about the ladies, how he likes cougars, likes to party; the time he hit NYC with an older woman he fucked in the ass, after which she ate his hole. Enough already! The three sit down and start jacking themselves off. They are an entertaining and exciting trio to watch, especially when they lean back and lift up their legs to show us their manholes. Brad unloads first, followed by Paul, then Skylar who has worked himself into a sweaty state. An awesome triple blast. The boys then hit the shower to wash themselves clean while squeezing under the single spigot - all of them quite fetching, especially Paul who looks so uncomfortable!
title: Skylar, Paul & Brad - Circle Jerk, Scene #01
